topic: OK to post for work opportunities?
body:
Hi All,


How do people feel about information relating to 3D modeling job 
opportunities on this list? Can I provide some basic description and 
contact information to the group? The work would not be directly related 
to the main interest of this group and does not relate to my company. 
This is for a friend of mine. Comments (preferences from the senior 
people, Peter, Greg....)?


Thanks,


-Jack


PS: I will not be offended if the consensus is no.




#	John E. de Valpine
#	president
#
#	visarc incorporated
#	http://www.visarc.com
#
#	channeling technology for superior design and construction
___
